title: Suspended PGPD Captain Charged with Assault
body:
On
Thursday, July 19, Maryland State Police arrested Prince George's
County Police Captain Thomas Hart who has been suspended from our agency for
more than three months.  Hart, a 22-year veteran of the department
assigned to the Bureau of Patrol, is charged with 1 count of felony assault and
1 count of misdemeanor assault stemming from a dispute yesterday with another
individual who is known to Hart.    Captain
Hart, 52 years old, was suspended without pay back in April stemming from a
criminal investigation in an unrelated matter.  Our
Internal Affairs Division is investigating.  We
cannot offer further comment at this time as the investigation is ongoing.
